get.summary: Gets a list of all the Codat standard categories.
Get account categories (suggested and confirmed) for a company connection.

patch.summary: Updates the categories for all or a batch of accounts for a specific connection.

get.summary: Gets the suggested and/or confirmed category for a specific account.

patch.summary: Updates or removes the confirmed category of a specific account.

get.summary: Gets match status for a given company and datatype.
Gets match summary for a given company and datatype, optionally restricted by a Codat query string.
Gets record-by-record match results for a given company and datatype, optionally restricted by a Codat query string.
Gets all the available financial metrics for a given company, over one or more periods.
Gets a fully categorized profit and loss statement for a given company, over one or more period(s).
Gets a fully categorized balance sheet statement for a given company, over one or more period(s).
Gets the revenue and revenue growth for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the order information for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the refunds information for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the customer retention metrics for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the lifetime value metric for a specific company connection, over one or more periods of time.
Gets the marketing metrics from an accounting source for a given company, over one or more periods of time.

post.summary: Request an Excel report for download.

get.summary: Returns the status of the latest report requested.

post.summary: Download the Excel report to a local drive.

get.summary: Download the Excel report to a local drive.
Gets a list of banking transactions and their categories.
Gets a list of accounts with account categories per statement period, specific to profit and loss
Gets a list of accounts with account categories per statement period, specific to balance sheet
Gets key metrics for subscription revenue.
Gets key metrics for subscription revenue.
Fetch a list of all companies metadata with accounting links on the Codat platform

post.summary: Initiate the process of onboarding a new company on the Codat platform

put.summary: Update a company with a new name and optional description

delete.summary: Deletes a company, this is not reversible.

get.summary: Fetch metadata on a single company.
Fetch settings on a single company.

put.summary: Update settings on a single company.

get.summary: Retrieve all data sources connected to a single company, including their connection statuses

post.summary: Connect a data source to a company
post.description:
Creates a data connection in PendingAuth status for the specified company and integration.
In the request body, specify the four-digit platformKey of the integration to link the company to as a text string.
Use GET /integrations to view all platformKeys. 
**Note: the required request body for this endpoint has been recently changed; see details [here](https://docs.codat.io/changelog/44714-deprecation-string-request-create-connections-endpoint).**

get.summary: Retrieve a single data source connected to a single company, including its connection status

delete.summary: Disconnect and delete a data source from a company
delete.description: This revokes and removes a data connection from being listed as a company's connection(s).

patch.summary: Disconnect a data source from a company
patch.description:
This revokes a companys access to a data source, but the data connection is still listed as a part of a company's
data connection(s). The status value in the request body should be "Unlinked" (case sensitive). Data connections
can only be unlinked if in the Linked or Deauthorized state.

put.summary: Put authorization information for a single data source connected to a single company.

get.summary: Get BankFeed BankAccounts for a single data source connected to a single company.

put.summary: Put BankFeed BankAccounts for a single data source connected to a single company.

patch.summary: Update a single BankFeed BankAccount for a single data source connected to a single company.

post.summary: Initiates the process of capturing a new data snapshot for a company
post.description: Initiates the synchronisation for all possible data types supported by the linked data sources

post.summary: Initiates the process of capturing a data snapshot of a specified type for a company
post.description: Initiates the synchronisation for a specified data type

get.summary: Fetch a list of all data snapshots captured for a company
Fetch metadata on a single data synchronisation

to access the API.
